mapper.select: select b.*, u.realname from tb_equipment_buy b left join tb_user u on b.teacher_id = u.user_id and u.user_type = 1 order by b.buy_status ASC
mapper.update: update tb_equipment_buy b set buy_status = #{buyStatus} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_equipment_buy (teacher_id, product_name, product_num, `name`, `type`, `count`, price, detail, total_money) select #{teacherId}, #{productName}, #{productNum}, #{name}, #{type}, #{count}, #{price}, #{detail}, #{totalMoney} from DUAl where not exists ( select b.* from tb_equipment_buy b where b.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and b.product_num = #{productNum} and (b.buy_status = 0 or b.buy_status = 2) )
mapper.select: select e.* from tb_equipment e order by e.id ASC
